name: Stop the Heist! (Neometanic)
description:
There are thieve planning an art heist, and YOU are the only one who can stop them! 

These guys think they're clever for only communicating with facts about the painting they're planning to steal. Look over the clues and use them the determine the target! Don't know anything about art? This is a great opportunity to do some research and to get to know these classic popular pieces a little bit better! 

Made for GamePlusJam2021!
